Uses of Package
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.region

  • Packages that use org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.region 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.region  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.procedure2.store.region  
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.region used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master 
    Class and Description
    MasterRegion
    A region that stores data in a separated directory, which can be used to store master local data.
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.region used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.region 
    Class and Description
    MasterRegion
    A region that stores data in a separated directory, which can be used to store master local data.
    MasterRegionFlusherAndCompactor
    As long as there is no RegionServerServices for a master local region, we need implement the flush and compaction logic by our own.
    MasterRegionParams
    The parameters for constructing MasterRegion.
    MasterRegionWALRoller
    As long as there is no RegionServerServices for a master local region, we need implement log roller logic by our own.
    UpdateMasterRegion 
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.region used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.procedure2.store.region 
    Class and Description
    MasterRegion
    A region that stores data in a separated directory, which can be used to store master local data.
